Detailed Description

Handles network communicaion for the server in-game.

This class gathers messages received from the clients, sorts them, and allows the ServerEnvironment to access them.
This impliments CL_Runnable; but the funny thing is, it isn't on-its-own thread safe - the storage class FusionNetworkMessageQueue is... I guess that just makes it tidier?
